scripts.build:lib: npm run -w @alephhack/router build && npm run -w @alephhack/main-menu build && npm run -w @alephhack/match build && npm run -w @alephhack/inventory build && npm run -w @alephhack/train build && npm run -w @alephhack/play build
scripts.build:product: npm run -w @alephhack/web build && npm run -w @alephhack/electron build
scripts.build: npm run build:lib && npm run build:product
scripts.watch:lib: concurrently "npm run -w @alephhack/router watch" "npm run -w @alephhack/main-menu watch" "npm run -w @alephhack/match watch" "npm run -w @alephhack/inventory watch" "npm run -w @alephhack/train watch" "npm run -w @alephhack/play watch"
